alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:10PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Itasca, northeastern Aitkin and southwestern St. Louis Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 609 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pengilly, to 7 miles north of Swan River, to near Warba, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Grand Rapids Airport recorded a wind gust of 42 mph at 533 PM with these storms. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Warba around 615 PM CDT. Swan River and Jacobson around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Hart Lake, Calumet, Floodwood Lake, Swan Lake, Wawina, Goodland, Marble, Silica and Hill Annex Mine State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
